𓅪 four similar signs

  1. GVAL 𓅪𓅫 гъ́лтам gǎ́ltam -voll -full foul/evil/cul(small) k-lein -ling *ǵʰer- “short/kurz” cour的 :
  2. GWøR 𓅨𓅩 गिरति girati -bar -faire very great vs voll, full, viel vs gewaltig
